reg_pit.title: Retention of Fees for Liquor Training Programs Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE self-repealed by BC Reg 50/2019, effective October 31, 2019.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Retention of Fees for Liquor Training Programs Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: A person approved under section 184 (2) of the Liquor Control and Licensing Regulation to provide a training program prescribed under section 60 of the Liquor Control and Licensing Act who collects the fee prescribed under that Act for the training program is authorized to retain the fee as remuneration for providing the training program.
This regulation is repealed on October 31, 2019.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Liquor Control and Licensing Act, S.B.C. 2015, c. 19, s. 83 (b)]
